findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallets
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to burn tokens from specific wallets.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has unrestricted authority to set tax fees without any limit, which can lead to exploitation by setting high percentage values.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to stop or pause transactions.
